Title: The Tom/Brady
Writer: Sam Catlin (developed by), Evan Goldberg (developed by), Seth Rogen (developed by)
Actors: Dominic Cooper, Joseph Gilgun, Ruth Negga, Graham McTavish
Plot: Annville, Angelville and the Grail team up to steal souls in New Orleans and Osaka in a last-ditch effort to satisfy Gran'ma and save the world.
